rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0002
rows.name:
What is it? I believe I told you
to leave me undisturbed while I am here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0003
rows.name: It's just... there's a message from Ga Derg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0005
rows.name:
From Ga Derg, former Crown Prince of Lars and current mercenary leader,
to Luxaar, junior consul:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0006
rows.name:
I offer my deepest gratitude for your
generous employment up to this day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
However, we are unable to fulfill the order
to annihilate the humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Therefore, though it brings us keen sorrow,
we withdraw from the protection of the Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Henceforth, we wish to operate as an independent mercenary group,
and humbly report this intention.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
I look forward to the day
we meet on the battlefield as worthy adversaries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0012
rows.name: A mere watchdog dares defy its master!? [ST:wait ]
